org.xbmc.api.data

Interface IMusicClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IClient
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MusicClient, MusicClient

    public interface IMusicClient
extends IClient
    This is the interface between the business layer and the presentation layer. All the business layer gets to see is this interface.
    Author:
    Team XBMC

      • setPlaylistPosition

        boolean setPlaylistPosition(INotifiableManager manager,
                          int position)
        Sets the media at playlist position position to be the next item to be played.
        Parameters:
        position - New position, starting with 0.
        Returns:
        True on success, false otherwise.

      • removeFromPlaylist

        boolean removeFromPlaylist(INotifiableManager manager,
                         int position)
        Removes media from the current playlist. It is not possible to remove the media if it is currently being played.
        Parameters:
        position - Position to remove, starting with 0.
        Returns:
        True on success, false otherwise.

      • removeFromPlaylist

        boolean removeFromPlaylist(INotifiableManager manager,
                         java.lang.String path)
        Removes media from the current playlist. It is not possible to remove the media if it is currently being played.
        Parameters:
        position - Complete path (including filename) of the media to be removed.
        Returns:
        True on success, false otherwise.

      • play

        boolean play(INotifiableManager manager,
           Album album,
           int sortBy,
           java.lang.String sortOrder)
        Plays an album. Playlist is previously cleared.
        Parameters:
        album - Album to play
        sortBy - Sort field, see SortType.*
        sortOrder - Sort order, must be either SortType.ASC or SortType.DESC.
        Returns:
        True on success, false otherwise.

      • play

        boolean play(INotifiableManager manager,
           Genre genre,
           int sortBy,
           java.lang.String sortOrder)
        Plays all songs of a genre. Playlist is previously cleared.
        Parameters:
        genre - Genre
        sortBy - Sort field, see SortType.*
        sortOrder - Sort order, must be either SortType.ASC or SortType.DESC.
        Returns:
        True on success, false otherwise.

      • playNext

        boolean playNext(INotifiableManager manager)
        Starts playing/showing the next media/image in the current playlist or, if currently showing a slidshow, the slideshow playlist.
        Returns:
        True on success, false otherwise.

      • playPrev

        boolean playPrev(INotifiableManager manager)
        Starts playing/showing the previous media/image in the current playlist or, if currently showing a slidshow, the slideshow playlist.
        Returns:
        True on success, false otherwise.

      • playlistSetSong

        boolean playlistSetSong(INotifiableManager manager,
                      int pos)
        Sets the media at playlist position position to be the next item to be played. Position starts at 0, so SetPlaylistSong(5) sets the position to the 6th song in the playlist.
        Parameters:
        pos - Position
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise.

        Gets all albums with given artist IDs
        Parameters:
        artistIDs - Array of artist IDs
        Returns:
        All compilation albums

      • getSongs

        java.util.ArrayList<Song> getSongs(INotifiableManager manager,
                                 Album album,
                                 int sortBy,
                                 java.lang.String sortOrder)
        Returns a list containing all tracks of an album. The list is sorted by filename.
        Parameters:
        album - Album
        sortBy - Sort field, see SortType.*
        sortOrder - Sort order, must be either SortType.ASC or SortType.DESC.
        Returns:
        All tracks of an album

      • getSongs

        java.util.ArrayList<Song> getSongs(INotifiableManager manager,
                                 Artist artist,
                                 int sortBy,
                                 java.lang.String sortOrder)
        Returns a list containing all tracks of an artist. The list is sorted by album name, filename.
        Parameters:
        artist - Artist
        sortBy - Sort field, see SortType.*
        sortOrder - Sort order, must be either SortType.ASC or SortType.DESC.
        Returns:
        All tracks of the artist

      • getSongs

        java.util.ArrayList<Song> getSongs(INotifiableManager manager,
                                 Genre genre,
                                 int sortBy,
                                 java.lang.String sortOrder)
        Returns a list containing all tracks of a genre. The list is sorted by artist, album name, filename.
        Parameters:
        genre - Genre
        sortBy - Sort field, see SortType.*
        sortOrder - Sort order, must be either SortType.ASC or SortType.DESC.
        Returns:
        All tracks of the genre

      • getSongs

        java.util.ArrayList<Song> getSongs(INotifiableManager manager,
                                 Artist artist,
                                 Genre genre,
                                 int sortBy,
                                 java.lang.String sortOrder)
        Returns a list containing all tracks of a genre AND and artist. The list is sorted by artist, album name, filename.
        Parameters:
        genre - Genre
        sortBy - Sort field, see SortType.*
        sortOrder - Sort order, must be either SortType.ASC or SortType.DESC.
        Returns:
        All tracks of the genre

      • getCompilationArtistIDs

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getCompilationArtistIDs(INotifiableManager manager)
        Returns a list containing all artist IDs that stand for "compilation". Best case scenario would be only one ID for "Various Artists", though there are also just "V.A." or "VA" naming conventions.
        Returns:
        List of compilation artist IDs

      • getCover

        Bitmap getCover(INotifiableManager manager,
              ICoverArt cover,
              int size)
        Returns album thumbnail as base64-encoded string
        Parameters:
        album -
        Returns:
        Base64-encoded content of thumb
